---
title: "00_all"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(purrr)
library(quarto)  # comes with Quarto

pipeline <- c(
  "01_load.qmd",
  "02_clean.qmd",
  "03_augment.qmd",
  "04_describe.qmd",
  "05_analysis_1.qmd",
  "05_analysis_2.qmd",
  "06_analysis_2.qmd",
  "99_proj_func.R"
)

# Render all .qmd files to HTML
q_docs <- pipeline[grepl("\\.qmd$", pipeline)]

walk(q_docs, ~{
  message("Rendering: ", .x)
  quarto_render(.x)   # produces .html next to the .qmd
})
```
